amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike section 431 related to the Clean Power Plan.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 29 printed in House Report 114-683 to strike section 431.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Peters amendment (A026) Failed by recorded vote: 182 - 244 (Roll no. 431).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A026) offered by Mr. Peters.
